After an absence of seven years, Kristin returns to the Apple Hill stage as Muriel,  the 'warm and loving' wife of Henry. She thanks Ron for the chance to indulge in her favorite past time. Kristin has performed in many shows since her theatrical start in 1991. Ligonier Valley Players,  Apple Hill, Theatre Factory and Greensburg Civic have all provided wonderful experiences over the years. Kristin currently works in broadcasting and lives with her 16 cats. All her performances are dedicated with love to her family.
